mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userId, userPw, userName, userPhone1, userPhone2, userEmail1, userEmail2, addrBasic, addrDetail, addrZipNum) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone1}, #{userPhone2}, #{userEmail1}, #{userEmail2}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail}, #{addrZipNum})
